com.mostlymagic.util.functional
Interface Series<E>

All Superinterfaces:
Adding<Series<E>,E>, ArrayView<E>, Containing<E>, Deleting<Series<E>,E>, Filtering<Series<E>,E>, Gathering<E>, Indexing<E>, Inserting<Series<E>,E>, IterableView<E>, Joining<E>, ListView<E>, Removing<Series<E>,E>, Replacing<Series<E>,E>, Reversing<Series<E>>, Sequencing<Series<E>,E>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSeries, ArraySeries, HeadTailSeries
public interface Series<E>
extends Gathering<E>, Inserting<Series<E>,E>, Deleting<Series<E>,E>, Filtering<Series<E>,E>, ListView<E>, Reversing<Series<E>>, Sequencing<Series<E>,E>, ArrayView<E>, Indexing<E>, Replacing<Series<E>,E>

Loosely equivalent to List, but with a different contract: every method that adds or removes items must return a new instance of the Series.

Author:
Sean Patrick Floyd

Method Detail

transform

<O> Series<O> transform(Function<E,O> function)
Returns a new Series by transforming all Elements of this Series using the supplied converter Function.

Parameters:
function - a converter function, may not be null
Returns:
the new Series
